lemma Exit_not_dyn_weak_control_dependent:
  assumes control:"n weakly controls (_Exit_) via as" shows "False"
translations:
lemma Exit_not_dyn_weak_control_dependent:
  assumes control:"n weakly controls (_Exit_) via as" shows "False"

proof (chain)
picking this:
  n weakly controls (_Exit_) via as

obtain as a as' where path:"n -as\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)" and as:"as = a#as'"
    and pd:"(_Exit_) postdominates (targetnode a)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  n weakly controls (_Exit_) via as

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>as a as'.
        \<lbrakk>n -as\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_); as = a # as';
         (_Exit_) postdominates targetnode a\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  n -as\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)
  as = a # as'
  (_Exit_) postdominates targetnode a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  n -as\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)
  as = a # as'

proof (prove)
using this:
  n -as\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)
  as = a # as'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n -[] @ a # as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)

proof (state)
this:
  n -[] @ a # as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (prove)
using this:
  n -[] @ a # as'\<rightarrow>* (_Exit_)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. valid_edge a

proof (state)
this:
  valid_edge a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (_Exit_) postdominates targetnode a
  valid_edge a

proof (prove)
using this:
  (_Exit_) postdominates targetnode a
  valid_edge a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (state)
this:
  False
